MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Kempsthorn Crescent and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.10pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at Belltrees substation are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.36pm on Wednesday 23rd December 2020.
